General.Name: Sonoro Gold Corp
General.Description: Sonoro Gold Corp., an exploration stage company, is involved in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Mexico. The company primarily explores for gold and silver deposits. Its flagship project is the Cerro Caliche Group of Concessions that covers an area of approximately 1,400 hectares located in the municipality of Cucurpe, Mexico. The company was formerly known as Sonoro Metals Corp. and changed its name to Sonoro Gold Corp. in August 2020. Sonoro Gold Corp. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 625 Howe Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2T6
